$$ 0 = \left({H \over 5} \sinh {5 \over H} 15\right) - 25$$

Define this equation into a function:

```{julia}
#| label: f-H
#| eval: true
#| include: true

f(h) = (h/5.0 * sinh(5.0/h) * 15) - 25
```

Find the zeros (starting guess between 30 and 60)

```{julia}
#| label: find-zero
#| eval: true
#| include: true

fzeros(f, 30, 60)
```
